sentences.en: A Scotsman is always wise behind the hand.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰人总是事后聪明.

sentences.en: But the fiery Scotsman also paid tribute to another of his midfielders, Park Ji - sung .
sentences.cn: 但是富有热情的苏格兰老人也对他的中场 朴智星 表达谢意.

sentences.en: Founded by the Scotsman David Dunbar Buick in 1899, the upscale Buick brand was the first marketed by what would eventually become General Motors.
sentences.cn: 由苏格兰人大卫·邓巴·别克于1899年创立，别克这个高端的品牌是由如今的通用公司首先投入市场的。

sentences.en: The canny Scotsman was more than a match for the swindlers.
sentences.cn: 这个精明的苏格兰人比骗子还历害.

sentences.en: The Scotsman William "Captain" Kidd seizes his biggest prize, the loot-laden Armenian ship Cara Merchant, off the coast of India.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰人“船长基德”抓住了他人生中最大的一笔横财，印度附近海域中装满了战利品的美国船“加拉商人”号。

sentences.en: We met, the Scotsman and I, one summer at the Edinburgh Festival.
sentences.cn: 在爱丁堡艺术节的一个夏天，我与那个苏格兰人相遇了。

sentences.en: What does a Scotsman wear underneath his kilt?
sentences.cn: 苏格兰男子在短裙下面穿着什麽?
